data.text:
Stayed here for a Family holiday and the hotel turns into a brothel at night, You cannot simply go by the pool to enjoy a drink late at night without having to see prostitutes in the main areas of the hotel.
The Hostess at the front of the library bar specifically walks you through the main bar to showcase the room full of prostitutes.
The management, many security personnel and all staff specifically know who is a prostitute and who is not but they still go ahead and let them in.
Even worst is at breakfast they still allow these ladies in the breakfast area with the clients to have breakfast.
A good 5 star hotel during the day but turns into a 5 star Brothel at night.
data.title: Not suitable for Family - Turns into a Brothel

data.text: The place I recently visited was a cozy and extended cafe with the nice view of Burj Khalifa . From the moment I walked in, I was greeted by Meera with a warm, smiling and inviting atmosphere. The decor was charming and simple, with just the right amount of character. Lovely place to visit for coffee in dubai
data.title: Excellent

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 164ritus,

Marhaba from Kempinski The Boulevard Dubai. 

Thank you for sharing your experience! The cafe you recently visited sounds like a delightful spot, offering both coziness and a picturesque view of the Burj Khalifa. Meera's warm and inviting greeting undoubtedly added to the welcoming atmosphere, setting the tone for a pleasant visit. The charming and simple decor, infused with just the right amount of character, surely enhanced your coffee experience in Dubai. We appreciate your kind words and hope to welcome you back soon for another enjoyable coffee outing.

Best Regards, 

Sity Nurhayati
Management Office
owner_response.author: Sity Nurhayati

data.text:
Today I visited here view and ambience was mind blowing Everything was perfect the hotel is beautiful with good service n.my stay was beyond my expectations and service in lobby lounge was greatful all credit goes to this Beautiful lady Sakshi..
Sure I vll visit again
data.title: Excellent service 10/10

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear somaj779,

Marhaba from Kempinski The Boulevard Dubai. 

We sincerely appreciate your kind words and the perfect rating you've given us.

It's wonderful to hear that you had such a fantastic experience during your visit to our hotel. We strive to provide our guests with a beautiful ambiance and excellent service, and we're delighted that we exceeded your expectations.

Thank you for recognizing Sakshi for her outstanding service at the lobby lounge. We will make sure to pass on your compliments to her and the rest of our team.

We look forward to welcoming you back for another exceptional experience in the near future. 

Best Regards, 

Sity Nurhayati
Management Office
owner_response.author: Sity Nurhayati

owner_response.title: Owner response

data.text:
This is a review for the Iftar at the restaurant.
 It’s day 24 in Ramadan and we have had Iftar out at 22 different restaurants in Dubai including Burj Al Arab, Atlantis, Ewaan, French, Chinese, Japanese, Moroccan, Turkish, Russian Tajikistan, Uzbekistan and various Address properties across Dubai. 
The Iftar at the boulevard is absolutely the best among all the ones we visited. The food choices, quality, desserts, tea, service, attention to detail, etc etc. are all excellent. We are so impressed. It’s the only place we have visited twice this Ramadan. Management is involved and courteous. You see them walking around and watching the staff. We interacted with one of the managers, Hasan. So pleasant    Thank you and I think we will come one more time before the end of the holly month.
data.title: Excellent Iftar

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear S1729GFdj,

Marhaba from Kempinski The Boulevard Dubai. 

Thank you immensely for sharing your experience of our Iftar at the restaurant. Your detailed review truly means a lot to us.

We're honored to have stood out among the numerous esteemed establishments you've visited during Ramadan. Your kind words about our food choices, quality, desserts, tea, and service are deeply appreciated. It's wonderful to know that you found every aspect of your dining experience to be excellent.

Our team takes great pride in providing exceptional service, and we're thrilled to hear that our management, including Hasan, made a positive impression on you. Your recognition of their involvement and courtesy is truly appreciated.

We would be delighted to welcome you back for another memorable Iftar before the conclusion of the holy month. Thank you once again for choosing us, and we look forward to your next visit.

Best Regards, 

Sity Nurhayati
Management Office
owner_response.author: Sity Nurhayati
